articles.author: LEAH WILLINGHAM
articles.title: Mexican immigrant families plagued by grief, questions after plant workers swept away by Helene - The Associated Press
articles.description: Hurricane Helene left a devastating mark on the small Latino community that makes up a disproportionate number of workers at a plastics factory in Erwin, Tennessee. Six of its workers were swept away, four of them Mexican Americans. Loved ones and supporters …
articles.content: ERWIN, Tenn. (AP) With shaking hands, Daniel Delgado kissed a photo of his wife, Monica Hernandez, before lighting a candle in a supermarket parking lot. Family members hugged pictures printed on pos… [+6891 chars]

articles.title: Big Solar Storm To Hit Earth, Warns NASA. Will It Affect India? - NDTV
articles.description: American scientists have issued a warning that a big solar storm is going to hit the Earth, and it may affect electronic communications. What will be its impact on India?
articles.content:
Dr Annapurni Subramanian and NDTV Science Editor Pallava Bagla in Merak village, Ladakh
